items.headline: ‘Affordability is a con job for consumers’: 2025 was one hell of a year. What can we learn from it?
items.summary_en: Tariffs, an AI boom, geopolitical divisions and a new administration ushered in a unique, unsettling year for consumers.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘We all have economic jitters’: After the Fed cut rates, should my son buy a $600K house?
items.summary_en: “They are tuned in to friends and colleagues, who are losing jobs, cognizant of shifts in company agendas and financial worries.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘The stress at my job is getting worse every day’: I’m 61, earn $177K, and have a 401(k) with $965K. Do I retire and downsize?
items.summary_en: “I don’t want to end up in a nursing home on Medicare like my grandma.”

items.headline: Maroon 5 frontman Adam Levine and supermodel Behati Prinsloo buy a $17 million chunk of Oprah’s ‘promised land’ estate
items.summary_en: California is home to hundreds of properties with celebrity history—but it’s unlikely any dwelling can compete with the legacy of the one that was just sold by TV mogul Oprah Winfrey.

items.headline: Actress Emma Stone sells Austin mansion she never lived in for $23.5 million
items.summary_en: Actress Emma Stone will kick off 2026 with one less thing to worry about—after selling her newly-renovated Texas mansion a year after listing it.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Sanofi stock slumps after two setbacks on multiple-sclerosis drug
items.summary_en: Shares of Sanofi slumped on Monday as the French drugmaker said a U.S. regulatory review of its multiple-sclerosis drug won’t be completed by the end of the year and that a trial for a different form of MS didn’t succeed.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures rise ahead of year’s last full week of trading
items.summary_en: Stocks slid on Friday, led by a sharp decline in the tech sector, as investors continue a “rotation trade” out of AI stocks.

items.headline: Roomba maker iRobot files for bankruptcy, will go private
items.summary_en: Roomba maker iRobot filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy Sunday and will turn over its business to a pair of Chinese companies and go private, capping a years-long fall from grace.

items.headline: The deadline to enroll in Obamacare is Monday if you want coverage to start Jan. 1
items.summary_en: The subsidies that made Affordable Care Act plans more affordable are expiring, and marketplace coverage in 2026 will be much more expensive.
